channel.title: What language are scripts built out of?
channel.description:
What language are these scripts built out of?
If it's a useful language I might be interested in learning it through this :D
And would it be hard for me to learn? (Being that I know C and PHP - is it any similar to either of these?)

item.title: What language are scripts built out of?
item.dc:creator: @oliver1205 oliver1205
item.description:
@oliver1205 wrote:

scar scripts are based HEAVILY off of pascal

Read full topic

item.source: What language are scripts built out of?

item.title: What language are scripts built out of?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

SCAR scripts don’t specifically use a language, there based on pascal.

Think of includes as library’s, and it doesn’t take long before your making your own scripts. I’m sure you’ll do fine.

I think this(made by me :P)(Clicky) tutorial should explain things pretty well for you.

Read full topic
item.source: What language are scripts built out of?

item.title: What language are scripts built out of?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

It is based heavily on Pascal.

I personally don’t know SCAR too well, but I got the basics down quite quickly. There are many guides around to help you get started with SCAR. It is different from C and PHP, but all languages have similarities and with your givin experience you should find it easy to learn(in my opinion).

Read full topic
